attributes.action: Save the Sunderland Alzheimer's society centre from closure
attributes.additional_details: In June the Alzheimer's society plan to close their Sunderland  centre due to lack of funding  please  sign and stop  this
attributes.background:
I am both very sad and very angry that the Alzheimer’s Society have announced the closure of the amazing Sunderland Day Centre. At today’s meeting the love and admiration that so many have for the work done in this Centre was plain for all to see
PLEASE share this post
